function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection of SARS-CoV-2 RNA in influent samples from multiple wastewater treatment plants.","Impact":"Potential spread of SARS-CoV-2 in the community and surrounding areas.","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced treatment processes to eliminate SARS-CoV-2 in wastewater, and increased monitoring for early detection.","Technologies":"Advanced oxidation processes, UV disinfection, and enhanced filtration systems.","People":"Community members, workers at the treatment plants, and residents in surrounding areas.","Owner":"Local health authorities, wastewater treatment plant operators, and government agencies."}]}
